headline: Former congresswoman Gabby Giffords hospitalized with appendicitis
author: KNXV Satff
sentences: Giffords checked into a hospital on Tuesday and is currently being treated, according to a statement from Jacob Peters, a spokesperson for Sen. Mark Kelly.
She continues to appear publicly at events like the DNC and regularly advocates for gun control measures.
Giffords, then a member of the U.S. House, was shot in the head during an assassination attempt in 2011.
TUCSON, Ariz. â€” Former Arizona congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords has been hospitalized with appendicitis.
Though she survived the shooting, she was left with aphasia and limited vision.
This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
Additional details about Giffords' hospitalization haven't been released.
This story was originally published by Scripps station KNXV in Phoenix.
Kelly, Giffords' husband, is heading home to Tucson to be with her.
She resigned as a congresswoman in 2012 to focus on her recovery.
